title: Is there a point in staying non-toxic?
body: Before you had to stay non-toxic enough to unlock keys. Now You have to do it to unlock honor and then unlock level 1 on top of that which probably takes a long time. After you get punished once and drop to dishonorable, it's just like "fuck it. not worth bro"

replies.body:
> Is there a point in staying non-toxic?

If you plan on playing League of Legends with that account in the future then yes. 

If it is so hard for you to even pretend to be a normal, descent human being than just flame away bud.

"Being a decent human being is too hard." -OP
http://www.auplod.com/u/aopdul99681.png

There are reasons for behaving like a mature and respectful person.

1) Key fragments.
2) Honor capsules.
3) Being able to play LoL.
4) Higher honor levels.
5) Ranked rewards (assuming you play ranked).
